items.sentence: We have to leave now if we want to get home before dark.
I thought you said you didn\'t know how to speak French.
Tom earns the money, but it\'s managed by his wife Mary.
I\'m looking forward to seeing you in your cap and gown.
I think you know that Tom isn\'t going to be here today.
Tom didn\'t want to tell anybody about what he had done.
Tom thinks he can do anything if he puts his mind to it.
Tom thinks he can trust Mary not to do something stupid.
I never dreamed so many people would come to my concert.
Both Tom and John said that they were in love with Mary.
